mapper.select: SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, rownum as num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark FROM goods_2 WHERE release_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-07-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY release_date DESC )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, rownum as num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark FROM goods_2 WHERE type='남자')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
